mapper.select: select re.resume_name, re.resume_birth, re.resume_email, re.resume_address, re.resume_location, re.resume_grade, re.resume_phone_number, re.resume_sex, re.resume_content from user_tb ur inner join resume_tb re on ur.id = re.user_id where re.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resume_tb(user_id, resume_name, resume_birth, resume_email, resume_address, resume_location, resume_grade, resume_phone_number, resume_sex, resume_content, created_at) values(#{userId}, #{resumeName}, #{resumeBirth}, #{resumeEmail}, #{resumeAddress}, #{resumeLocation}, #{resumeGrade}, #{resumePhoneNumber}, #{resumeSex}, #{resumeContent}, now())
mapper.update: update resume_tb set resumename= #{resumename},password= #{password}, email= #{email} where id = #{id}
